page.title: 08TOURING PARK, ALLET, TRURO.
page.content: Summer Valley Touring Park occupies a 3-acre site between Shortlanesend & Allet.It accommodates caravans, tents & camper-vans on 60 pitches each about 30ft.long.The resident owners, husband & wife,have run the site for 3 seasons & are members of the National Federation of Campsite Operators. Charges vary from Â£1/person/night in low season to Â£1.75, high season, in August, & 60p.for children. The season lasts 7 months, 3 of which are very busy. Facilities include a small shop, play area,toilets,showers & washbasins It is a quiet site with no bar or disco. People come from all over the country, mainly the Midlands & Bristol Channel area, but also from Scotland & the North & from abroad:France,Germany Scandinavia & from Australia in early season when they have cheap rates for travel.
